## Vector3.Add() method

Returns a new Vector3 as the result of the addition of the two given vectors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Add(vector1: ReadOnlyVector3, vector2: ReadOnlyVector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vector1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | the first vector |
|  vector2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | the second vector |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the resulting vector
